data.actual_result: User doesn't show up under recently played
data.expected_result: User shows up under recently played
data.short_description: Users don't show up in recently played on game modals if playing on Xbox
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a user play a verified game on Xbox (game name opens a modal when clicked) - Open the game modal to make sure they're in the now playing - Close the game modal and have the user stop playing the game - Reopen the game modal and look at recently played - Sidenote: Other users that played the game on desktop recently didn't show under recently played while user was under now playing
